reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shrug jacket beautifully made, with lovely material texture and smooth fabric. The sleeves are long and comfortable, with one customer noting they shirr up naturally on the wrist, while another mentions they sit well on the shoulders. They appreciate its appearance, with one noting it's perfect for chilly places, and find it soft and cozy. The sizing receives mixed feedback, with several customers

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little cover up.
items.body: I really love these jackets. They don't cover the whole outfit and they just cover your shoulders and sleeves. It's nice if you want to have a little cover in over your shoulders and arms. Very stylish came in handy for what I needed it for. Read more
items.author: Bonnie Jean

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and huw it fits
items.body: Runs small. if you’re normally a medium go for the large. Read more
items.author: Naomi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have!!
items.body: Love this! Takes any sleeveless dress and makes it comfortable and beautiful to wear inside any chilly place. The material is smooth, soft and comfortable! Read more
items.author: Deborah

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars These Long Sleeves Nicely Wrinkle at the Wrists BUT Armpit Gap is Unflattering
items.body: PRO: Slinky fabric is surprisingly very comfortable and can make a nice difference if that summery dress you're wearing is being too chilly. Machine washable (but I use a lingerie bag to protect it). PRO: Long sleeves shirr up naturally on the wrist. I am sure there are some ladies with long (and difficult to cover) arms who would absolutely love these long sleeves. CON: Check out the photo: Model's akimbo arm shows a little crescent of flesh between this shrug and the strap of her shirt. In life, it is unflattering. I have worn this with a sleeveless dress (not even spaghetti strap top like this photo) and the same thing happens if I fold my arm akimbo. I know that the highest, tiniest shrugs (like this one) will have that coverage issue. This is not the kind that gives just a little coverage in front. CON: The Prussian Blue of this blue shade of fabric is not an easy match with many of today's fashions. I just don't have a lot of stuff (even though I buy blue often, and generally wear a "light summer" pallette, but this Prussian doesn't go with anything except very very faded denim/chambray n or compliment anything besides a dun brown. I am not sure what coloring this shade would compliment. But it is very unique, and not a basic shade unless MAYBE you are a soft "summer" with dark ashy brown hair. Just my thought. As a graying ash blond, this one is a bit of a "miss" for my wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Renee Thorpe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly awesome quality!
items.body: Wasn’t sure how this would fit/ feel/ look on. I love it!! Love the feel, love the look and fit. I am 5’2”, 115 lbs. I got the small in olive. Color beautiful. Fit perfect!! If you want a more roomy loose fit, get the M. I did not. I wore it over my dress at night when sun went down. Loved it. Fit like a glove. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the same quality.
items.body: This purchased sweater is not the same quality as the same item, same size, same company as I purchased last year. This one is smaller in that there is less material under the arm even as the same size a i has previously purchased and it wrinkled much more after washing and drying. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Comfy
items.body: I needed a shrug to go with a sleeveless blouse for a party. This definitely fit the bill. The fabric is nice and the fit was perfect. It did not overwhelm my blouse and felt so comfortable. I am a plus size gal and it was super flattering. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars cute dance shrug
items.body: This is such a cute shrug! It is very comfortable and durable. Read more
items.author: Louise

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Blue, Ivory, Burgundy, Black, Navy Blue, Dark Purple, Turquoise, Heather Grey, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
